response.original_title: San Antonio, Vida Cotidiana... Desde Abajo
response.overview: The Cali neighborhood of San Antonio is distinguished by the carefree character of its people and the constant animation of its streets. Among its most curious inhabitants are the piperos; Two of them find an old camera in a trash can and observe their “journey” through a devilish eye that generates fantastic stories with no less special characters. The visions weave a hieroglyph that can only be deciphered through a camera.
response.title: San Antonio, Vida Cotidiana... Desde Abajo
